thread.title: A look at why poor women in developing countries are less likely than men to use internet
thread.title_full: A look at why poor women in developing countries are less likely than men to use internet

title: A look at why poor women in developing countries are less likely than men to use internet
text: #developing countries A look at why poor women in developing countries are less likely than men to use internet Poor women in cities in developing countries are 50% less likely than poor men to use the Internet for which they blame high internet cost. ET Bureau | 23 October 2015, 8:09   Poor women in cities in developing countries are 50 per cent less likely than poor men to use the Internet. They blame high internet cost and their lack of skills for the gap, according to a survey by the Web Foundation. While 59 per cent of such men use the Internet, when it comes to women, just 37 per cent do so. Here's a look...
